Southern Yosemite Rock Climbs - Supplement 1

The Balls

Nightwatch - Book of Revelation

Book of Revelation

    Lone Pine Crack 5.7 Four pitches, full rack. FA: Elaine Cocuzzo, Thomas Hartmann (7/24/93).
    This climb is located to the right of Dave's Breakfast, just to the left of a major dihedral. It follows a right-leaning, pleasant hand crack to a single pine tree. From the tree, scramble 300 feet to the top over easy ground.

 

Nightwatch

    Unnamed 5.9 One pitch. FA: Elaine Cocuzzo, Thomas Hartmann (93).

    An awkward crack to the right of Roll the Wheenies.

Other Areas: Minaret Domes - Shuteye Ridge Area
